briefTitle: Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of rFVIIIFc in the Prevention and Treatment of Bleeding Episodes in Previously Treated Participants With Hemophilia A
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multicenter Evaluation of the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant Human Coagulation Factor VIII Fusion Protein (rFVIIIFc) in the Prevention and Treatment of Bleeding Episodes in Previously Treated Subjects With Hemophilia A

interventions.name: rFVIIIFc
otherNames: recombinant coagulation factor VIII Fc fusion protein

summary: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the long-term safety of recombinant human Factor VIII Fc fusion protein (rFVIIIFc) in participants with hemophilia A. The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the efficacy of rFVIIIFc in the prevention and treatment of bleeding episodes in participants with hemophilia A.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Any Positive Inhibitor Development

effectByArm.arm: rFVIIIFc (8HA02PED [6 to <12 Years Old Age Cohort])
